turns.text: Okay well some of the things I like to do are - I like to knit I knit sometimes and I sew --

Yeah Uh Ive not really done any too much challenging uh stuff I I can do it with needle and thread --

-- I think oh why didnt I learn these crafts and skills from her because she could crochet and --

Now did you say you could knit

If you I think if you can do any handicraft you can learn to crochet

-- just not sitting down at all
Thats true You know and and I always think well I can do this and watch or something --

Im at the age where bifocals or trifocals would be necessary Its so I find myself putting glasses on to to watch and then taking them off to do needlework and I get frustrated doing that so Just give it up
